3. [Boards & Commission](http://www.benbrook-tx.gov/114/Boards-Commission)

* Fourth Tuesday of the month, if needed

The Commission consists of five (5) regular members and four (4) alternate members who serve two-year terms. Places 1, 3, and 5 are appointed in odd-numbered years and Places 2 and 4 are appointed in even-numbered years.








1. #### Doug Howard

   City Planner
   [Email](mailto:dhoward@benbrook-tx.gov)
   Ph: 817-249-6061
